flares.upgraded: Place 1 common piece of your color on any empty square.
flares.pieces: Place 1 common piece of your color on any empty square, or convert 1 common enemy piece to your color.

legends.name: Earth Elemental
legends.text: Destroy a non-legendary piece on or adjacent to a red square. Then upgrade a common piece on or adjacent to a green square. Then the Earth Elemental may do 1 combat move to an adjacent red or green square.

legends.name: Hell Bull
legends.text: Choose any direction: The Hell Bull may do any number of combat moves in that direction. If it destroys a legendary piece, it stops.

faction_cards.name: Master of Intrigue
faction_cards.text: Do up to 3 moves: standard moves with the Master of Intrigue and/or combat moves using non-legendary pieces that were used to summon him.

faction_cards.name: High Priestess
faction_cards.text: The High Priestess may do 1 standard move. Whether she moves or not, you may then upgrade 1 common piece adjacent to her.

faction_cards.name: Hypnotist
faction_cards.text: You may choose up to 3 common or up to 2 heroic pieces in one enemy color: Do 1 combat move with each.

faction_cards.name: Knight
faction_cards.text: The Knight may do up to 3 combat moves. You cannot destroy common pieces with these moves.

faction_cards.name: Cannon
faction_cards.text: You may choose 1 of the indicated directions: Destroy all common pieces in that direction.

faction_cards.name: Messenger
faction_cards.text: You may choose 1 of your non-legendary pieces and a direction. That piece may do any number of standard moves in that direction.

faction_cards.name: Herald
faction_cards.text: Do up to 2 moves, using only your pieces. These moves can only be onto empty squares.

faction_cards.name: Champion
faction_cards.text: You may destroy 1 adjacent enemy piece. If that piece was legendary, you also destroy the Champion and gain an action.

faction_cards.name: Summoner
faction_cards.text: You may place up to 2 common pieces of your color on empty marked squares.

faction_cards.name: Cavalry Captain
faction_cards.text: You may choose 1 of your pieces other than the Cavalry Captain: You may do up to 1 combat move and up to 2 standard moves with it (in any order).

faction_cards.name: Infantry Captain
faction_cards.text: Do up to 2 combat moves, using your pieces other than the Infantry Captain.

faction_cards.name: Chronicler
faction_cards.text: Upgrade 1 of your common pieces other than the Chronicler. Then that piece may do a standard move.

faction_cards.name: Gryphon Rider
faction_cards.text: The Gryphon Rider may do a combat leap. If she does, you may then downgrade her and place 1 common piece of your color on an empty adjacent space.

faction_cards.name: Gun Tower
faction_cards.text: You may choose 1 of the indicated directions: Destroy the first 2 pieces in that direction. A legendary piece cannot be destroyed and stops the shot.

faction_cards.name: Bomb
faction_cards.text: If summoning the Bomb is your last action this turn, nothing happens ; otherwise, destroy the Bomb and all common pieces adjacent to it.

tasks.name: Green Legends
tasks.text: You have at least 2 upgraded pieces on green squares, and at least 1 of them is legendary.

tasks.name: Imprisonment
tasks.text: You have at least 6 pieces adjacent to the same enemy piece.

tasks.name: Envelopment
tasks.text: You have at least 7 pieces adjacent to the same enemy piece.

tasks.name: Red Legends
tasks.text: You have at least 2 upgraded pieces on red squares, and at least 1 of them is legendary.
